flavor: The system is so deeply rooted, who knows how far the cables run?
text: Whenever the Corp purges virus counters, you may gain 1[credit] for each virus counter removed and trash Acacia.
title: Acacia

flavor: "The site of the world's second beanstalk, or I'll die trying." - Mirja Byanyima, Director of VSEP
text: Whenever you draw a piece of ice, you may reveal it and install it protecting this server, lowering the install cost by 4[credit]. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Jinja City Grid

text: When Bacterial Programming is scored or stolen, you may look at the top 7 cards of R&D, add any number of them to HQ, trash any number of them, and arrange the rest in any order.
title: Bacterial Programming

flavor: He found it odd that three frozen yogurt shops, all less than a block from his, opened within the same week.
text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn.
The Runner loses 4[credit], if able.
title: Economic Warfare

text:
When SSL Endorsement is scored or stolen, place 9[credit] from the bank on it.
When the Corp's turn begins, he or she may take 3[credit] from SSL Endorsement. This ability is active even while SSL Endorsement is in the Runner's score area.
title: SSL Endorsement
